description: Lists the namespaces within a table bucket. For more information, see Table namespaces in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:ListNamespaces permission to use this operation.

parameters.name: tableBucketARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table bucket.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the namespace was created at.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that created the namespace.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that owns the namespace.

nested_items.name: namespaceId
nested_items.description: The system-assigned unique identifier for the namespace.

nested_items.name: tableBucketId
nested_items.description: The system-assigned unique identifier for the table bucket that contains this namespace.

nested_items.name: continuationToken
nested_items.description: The ContinuationToken for pagination of the list results.
